Title: Relates to price comparisons of prices charged by energy services companies
Summary: Relates to requirements for price comparisons of prices charged by energy services companies on customer bills.
LawCode: Amd ยง349-d, Gen Bus L; amd ยง2, Chap of 2025 (as proposed in S.3876 & A.3875)
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to the requirement to include a comparison of prices charged by energy services companies on a customer's billing statement; and to amend a chapter of the laws of 2025 amending the general business law relating to requiring comparison of prices charged by energy services companies, as proposed in legislative bills numbers S. 3876 and A. 3875, in relation to the effectiveness thereof
